name: Discover 'Ho Chi Minh Complex' and Hanoi Exotic Food
description:
Do you want to discover "Ba Dinh square", "Ho Chi Minh mausoleum", "The One pillar pagoda"? Do you want to enjoy Hanoi Exotic Food, especially Street Food? If your answer is YES. Congrats! I am the right person who can give you responses.

Our trip is from 8.00 am to 5.00 pm

Let's go!
